Articles.Content:
I want a flag with a black background with an Enron-style "F" on the left, but with the colour orange that's on my profile. I'd also like for the word "FTMCo" to be on the right in the same font as Rage097's flag, with the same text colour.

For reference:

Enron's Logo

Rage097's Flag

Whoever does it gets a rep point.

First one using that Inkscape. Not bad IMO.

Thank you, I like it

deletedelete

Edited May 24, 2013 by Alien1099

So quick thanks. Or did I just overlook it.

I like, pritty funny. It would be cool on a Tshirt. I was thinking more simplistic(flag like), with just an explosion and/or green splat

Actually did not see the request. Just threw this together 'cause I liked it. You're welcome to it.

If possible, I'd be grateful for a stylised TIE fighter with the planet Kerbin in the background.

Favoured background colours would be black/dark blue or red.

May I put one in?

Sorry for it being crooked, paint is really limited. But it will have this weasel on it, but instead of a spear it will be the Ksp logo on it's side and the flower will be the planet the rocket is going around. The weasel will have black lines stylized like the 3rd picture. The color scheme is a white background with the ksp logo in Cyan, and the weasel will be in black.

I wanted to try making something for a flag, and chose your request. Sorry if it's not exactly what you wanted. I tried to arrange the parts to best maximize the space and wasn't entirely clear on what you wanted.

How has someone not done the kerbal-style pirate flag suggestion in any way yet?

I like the idea of crossed SRBs in place of bones, too.
A Croatian or ex-Yugoslavian flag would be nice, just a bit kerbalized.

If possible, I'd be grateful for a stylised TIE fighter with the planet Kerbin in the background.

Favoured background colours would be black/dark blue or red.

Holy balls...ker-balls.

Could I make a request for four relatively simple ones? Each one is a symbol with text arcing under it as if it were the bottom of a circle surrounding the symbol. That text can be in a nifty font, or not; since there's not much "style" to these flags, feel free to add it if you like.

* Light-blue lowercase pi symbol on a midnight blue background, with light blue text arcing under it that reads "The Irrationals".

* Light-red (pink?) lowercase, italicized "i" (no quotes) on a dark red background, with light red text arcing under it that reads "The Imaginaries".

* Light-green "0/1" (no quotes) on a dark green background, with light green text arcing under it that reads "The Identities".

* Light purple capital aleph (it's a Hebrew letter... I think they have capital and lowercase, though I'm not sure) on a dark purple background with light purple text arcing under it that reads "The Infinities".

Thanks for your time and effort.

* Light-red (pink?) lowercase, italicized "i" (no quotes) on a dark red background, with light red text arcing under it that reads "The Imaginaries".

* Light purple capital aleph (it's a Hebrew letter... I think they have capital and lowercase, though I'm not sure) on a dark purple background with light purple text arcing under it that reads "The Infinities".

I like where you're going with this, although, I'll need at least an hour or so, probably a few.

I like where you're going with this, although, I'll need at least an hour or so, probably a few.

Take your time. I was about to apologize for not seeing the OP's recent edits to the top post saying "No text" and retract the request. But if you're willing, I'd love to have them.
